entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023
